thread.title: The Internet of Things, smart cities and what both mean to DHS

title: The Internet of Things, smart cities and what both mean to DHS
text:
The Internet of Things, smart cities and what both mean to DHS 
The Internet of Things, smart cities and what both mean to DHSFederal Times: Last week both the FBI and the Department of Homeland Security warned of risks associated with the emerging Internet of Things, or those devices that are readable, recognizable, locatable and controllable via the Internet. Certainly, there are many risks inherent with so many objects connected to networks, but there are also many smart technologies that can enhance security and DHSâ€™s mission to protect the nation.
